name: Gates
description:
A prototype of an arcade game - balls of different colors come from the left side, only the gate of the same color can stop them! Crashing against any other will cause you to lose. The game is still very incomplete - I plan to add another type of ball (white) that needs to go through all three gates, and introduce more variety in the pattern.

Controls:

  • Z, X and C control the three gates from left to right
  • Enter to restart after a Game over
